response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's valued at $12,000 to us. Considering its worth to you, we're offering it to you today at a special price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a product that could significantly enhance your experience and efficiency. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
